title: Region bounded by lnx and y=5-x part - a

content.description: Let R be the region in the first quadrant bounded by the x-axis and the graphs of y=ln x and y=5-x, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find the area of R.

topic.text: 8.5: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of y

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
